name: Oogear
description: With the MekaApes Game, OogaVerse introduces exciting new game mechanics such as evolution, fusion and a unique levelling-up system. These features, combined with the expansive OogaVerse collection, will make MekaApes the most in depth strategy game available on the Ethereum blockchain. Your NFTs may accumulate an ERC-20 utility token (“OG”) when they are staked in the smart contract. OG has no other functionality other than within the MekaApes Game ecosystem, and it cannot be purchased from The MekaApes Game Developers.
